contentBlocks.title: Renewable Energy Provisions

customConditions.comment: Building has a roof area greater than 55m²

paragraphs: Building must allocate 20% clear area for renewable energy installations.
Electrical switchboard provisions must be made for renewable energy systems.
Exemptions apply for heritage-listed buildings and cases of technical impossibility.

contentBlocks.title: Electric Vehicle Charging

customConditions.comment: Building has a carpark with 10 or more spaces per storey

paragraphs: Dedicated distribution boards must be provided for EV charging.
Minimum 20% of parking spaces must have EV charging infrastructure.
Infrastructure must be provided for future expansion.
Exemptions apply for heritage-listed buildings and remote locations without grid connection.

contentBlocks.title: Water Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: All fixtures must be WELS 4-star or better rated.
Water meters must be provided for major water uses.
Exemptions apply for heritage-listed buildings and cases of technical impossibility.
